Cheltenham Festival Day 2 - Queen Mother Champion Chase

The features race on the card for Day 2 of the Cheltenham Festival will as always be the Queen Mother Champion Chase for 2015, it is the Championship race for the 2 mile chasers and we have seen some real star names pick up the crown over recent years. Legendary names like Moscow Flyer and more recently Master Minded who won the race in both 2008 and 2009.
